item.title: A New Survey Says Employees Using AI Believe It Will Create New Jobs
item.description: People are enthusiastically embracing the new technology to perform tasks previously beyond their reach, and ‘future-proof’ their jobs.

item.title: 4 Tips for Holding Meetings Without Cutting Productivity
item.description: New survey data shows 72 percent of employees suffer burnout from too many meetings.

item.title: Nvidia Has Started the $5 Trillion Club. Here’s a Look at Its Rise, by the Numbers
item.description: The ravenous appetite for Nvidia’s chips is the main reason that the company’s stock price has increased so rapidly.

item.title: From Small to Fast at Inc. 5000
item.description: There’s no single key to successfully scaling a business, but Sun Home Sauna co-founder Adam Fischer and Arizona Land Consulting CEO Anita Verma-Lalli...

item.title: OpenAI’s IPO May Be Coming Soon—and It Could Be the Largest in History
item.description: OpenAI’s new corporate structure clears a path to an IPO, perhaps as early as 2027.
